titleStmt.title: Music Addressability API and Chopin's Etude in F Minor

div.head: Enhancing Music Notation Addressability API and Chopin's Etude in F Minor
div.p: In this example, we use the Enhancing Music Notation Addressability (EMA) API to refer to a specific part of Chopin's Etude in F Minor.
The MEI file for the full Etude is available on the Verovio website.
This example uses the EMA to refer to a specific section of the document: the third and fourth measures.
The EMA expression for this selection is: 3-4/all/@all.
